briefDescription: Saraswati Foundation is a non-profit NGO. Our nationally-recognized programs include schools, remedial education, computer training, adult literacy, skills training, microfinance and social entrepreneurship Art & Culture, Eco tourism, Environment and natural resource management, Health & Nutrition, HIV/AIDS, Labour & Employment, Rural Development & Poverty Alleviation, Urban Development & Poverty Alleviation, etc.The Saraswati Foundation operates with the single-minded focus of empowering rural India.
